name: bug-buzz
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user vibrates its
wings to generate a
damaging sound wave.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.
